remarks: The result of the group power operator when the exponent is positive. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Apr-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gxpval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
gxpval.2 $e |- P = ( ^g ` G ) $.
gxpval $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ K e. NN ) -> ( A P K ) = ( seq 1 ( G , ( NN X. { A } ) ) ` K ) ) $.
